Home

FndCert International Foundation Programme (Business Management)

Foundation Year Routes

The FndCert International Foundation Programme (Business Management) will help international students prepare for a degree in business management

Enquire Now
  • Overview
  • Modules
  • Entry Requirements
  • How to Apply
  • Career Prospects
  • Academic Team
  • FAQs

    • Location

    Regent College London

    September 2021

    Duration

    1 year

    Fee

    £9,250 (Overseas fee)

    Levels

    RQF Level 3

    Assessment

    Presentations, Group work, Portfolio, Assignments, Exams

    Download Course Brochure
    Full Course specification

    Delivered in partnership with

    Enquire Now

    Overview

    The FndCert International Foundation Programme (Business Management) is the ideal course for international students interested in studying business management in the UK. It is designed to introduce you to key topics in business management, help you improve your language skills, equip you with the academic skills that you will need and introduce you to Higher Education in the UK.

    You will enjoy teaching from our academic faculty that is interactive and has a strong focus on communication and group work. You will not just be learning from our academic team, but also from your fellow students as you work together and support each other’s progress.  Studying in a foreign country is a great opportunity and can be a life-changing experience. It can be a challenge too, so you will get full support and encouragement to make the most of your time living and studying in your exciting new UK environment.

    Why should I do the FndCert International Foundation Programme (Business Management)

    By doing the FndCert International Foundation Programme (Business Management) you can acquire a balance of business management knowledge, academic skills and English language. You will be able to develop your understanding of the key principles, practices and theories of business management. On successful completion of this Level 3 qualification, you can achieve an English level comparable to IELTS 6.0 or 6.5.

    Modules

    • Stage C for IFP and Pre-Masters (EFP4005)
    • Stage D for IFP and Pre-Masters (EFP4006)
    • Business In Practice (BMP3002)
    • Practical Digital Marketing (BMP3006)
    • Applied Business Finance (BMP3005)
    • World of Work (BMP300)

    Entry Requirements

    • A Secure English Language Test score of at least IELTS 5.0 or 5.5, or an approved comparable qualification
    • A High School Leaving Certificate (or equivalent), usually recognised as at least GCSE equivalent or above by UK NARIC

    How to Apply

    Each of our courses have different entry requirements and a different admission process. We encourage you to look at our course pages and the How to apply section for detailed information.

    From choosing your desired course, writing your personal statement and submitting the application, you can count on our friendly Recruitment Team for help and guidance at every step of the way. Get in touch to make an initial appointment to discuss your situation.

    Career Prospects

    After completing the FndCert International Foundation Programme (Business Management) successfully, you can apply for a business and management related Bachelor’s degree at Regent College London or strengthen your career prospects in business management related roles.

    Academic Team

    Bushan Mohan

    Academic Dean

    FHEA, MSc, BA (Hons)

    Mohammad T Islam

    Head of School of Business and Enterprise

    BSc, MBA, MEd

    FAQs

    How will the course be delivered?

    Read

    The course will initially be delivered digitally via Regent Digital. The delivery of the course will then move to the Regent College London campus for the traditional engagement, subject to the viability of groups and future guidance on social distancing.

    Students will also be given the option of blended learning, where they will attend digital classes for one day and attend classes at the Regent College London campus for traditional engagement for one day, subject to the viability of groups and future guidance on social distancing.

    Close
    Go to FAQs

    What our students say

    Gianina-Madlena Patrascanu

    BA (Hons) Marketing with Foundation Year

    Regent College London has this amazing partnership with the Bucks New University, providing you opportunities for your future. It is a very nice environment with lovely students and lovely staff, always happy and ready to help you improve your academic journey. They will give you support and assistance whenever you are in need. I would definitely recommend this institute, if someone is looking for a bachelor degree education. You will feel accepted and supported in this college.

    Robert Masasa

    BSc (Hons) Health and Social Care with Foundation Year (UOB)

    Regent College London is the best college in London because since I started studying there I can see they have the best teachers. The teaching is good and helpful and they are also really organised. If you have any problem in the college, the Student Services team is always is there to help you. For me, I think Regent College London is the best College in London.

    Andreia Craciun

    BA (Hons) Business Management Degree with Foundation Year

    I have gained courage to speak to people and I have more confidence in myself. I received a lot of help from my teachers and it was really interesting meeting new people and making new friends. I’m happy that I came to Regent College London to study, it was the right place to come and I would definitely recommend it.

    Radostina Todorova Dimitrova

    BA (Hons) Business Management

    My overall experience has been fantastic! I’ve made a great group of friends. My class size is small and we have a laugh with the tutors. The lessons are completely related to the job you want to do, and the course has made me rethink on what career I want because it leads you to many high paying jobs! I’ve learnt laws, legislation and skills that will benefit me in my career and its only my first year here! During the coronavirus, teaching has continued and tutors have been in regular contact to make sure I’m OK and to check if I need help. They’ve even worked out of hours to provide one to one support to get me through assignments! They’ve really gone above and beyond!

    Prakash Mandalia

    BA (Hons) Business Management (Top-up)

    A very friendly and helpful college. Been an extremely pleasureful experience with welcoming and friendly staff and qualified patient and very supportive tutors. Infact the whole experience is being one of feeling of belonging to a family. Being an old person with disability, the encouragement and support I received leaves me overwhelmed with gratitude. I have no qualms to sincerely recommend students to choose Regents College as their first choice of their educational endeavours.

    Stefania Voevod

    BA (Hons) Business Management Degree with Foundation Year

    I really love the teachers, they take the extra time and effort to help me. The college helps me to keep my dreams alive. It is a warm place where i feel very comfortable. The environment is really supportive. And most importantly, the teachers made me realise that to achieve something one requires vision, self-motivation, determination and hard work.

    Rashed Haider

    BEng (Hons) Software Engineering with Foundation Year

    The great thing about Regent College London is its campus location in central London. The newly refurbished campus is well equipped with state of the art technology. Our teachers did an awesome job during the COVID-19 pandemic by keeping the class running flawlessly through digital lessons.

    Galin Gavrailov

    BSc (Hons) Business Management with Foundation Year

    I would recommend the college because of the professionalism shown by the tutors and the attention they give to us students, so we thatcan progress. They are also very friendly and when we don’t understand something they spend time to explain the concepts to us properly.

    Hang Boi Quek

    BA (Hons) Business Management (Top-up)

    The lecturers are very professional in carrying out their duties and they are very helpful and patient with the students regardless of their bad behaviour. I strongly recommend Regent College London as college to pursue higher education. The knowledge that I gained from learning at Regent College after attending classes for just two months is more than what I learned at another college where I was for two years.

    Abdirahman Farah

    BA (Hons) Business Management Degree with Foundation Year

    I joined Regent college in 2018 to do a 4 year business management degree that included a foundation year. It is one of the best decisions that I have ever made. The staff are very kind and helpful, the teachers are professional and the facilities are excellent. I could not ask for more.

    Course enquiry

    • We take your privacy seriously and will only use your personal data to provide you the services you have requested from us. We will store your personal data for 5 years.

    •  
    • This field is for validation purposes and should be left unchanged.

    Regent College London aims to provide current information for our prospectus and website at all times however, it may occasionally be unable to run an advertised course for reasons of operational viability and student experience. In the event that a course is unable to run, or is only available at a different location, we will advise applicants and enrolled students at the earliest possible opportunity in writing. Applicants and students will, wherever feasible, be offered an alternative course or location of study.
